点击.en: to hit, to press, to strike (on the keyboard), to click (a web page button)

点数.en: to count and check, to tally, points (collected in some bonus scheme etc)

点水.en: to skim, lightly touching the water (as the dragonfly in the idiom 蜻蜓點水|蜻蜓点水), skin-deep

点滴.en: a drip, a little bit, intravenous drip (used to administer drugs)

点火.en: to ignite, to light a fire, to agitate, to start an engine, ignition, fig. to stir up trouble

点燃.en: to ignite, to set on fire, aflame

点石成金.en: to touch base matter and turn it to gold (idiom); fig. to turn crude writing into a literary gem

点破.en: to lay bare in a few words, to expose with a word, to point out bluntly

点穴.en: to hit a pressure point (martial arts), dim mak, see also 點脈|点脉[dian3 mai4]

点缀.en: to decorate, to adorn, sprinkled, studded, only for show

点餐.en: (at a restaurant) to order a meal, (of a waiter) to take an order

点点.en: Diandian (Chinese microblogging and social networking website)

点点滴滴.en: bit by bit, dribs and drabs, the little details, every aspect

党.en: party, association, club, society, CL:個|个[ge4]

党内.en: within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)

鼎.en: ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs, pot (dialect), to enter upon a period of (classical), Kangxi radical 206, one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes

鼓动.en: to agitate, to arouse, to instigate, to encite

鼓吹.en: to agitate for, to enthusiastically promote

鼓起.en: to summon one's (courage, faith etc), to puff up (one's cheeks etc), to bulge, to swell out

鼻涕虫.en: a slug, sb with a runny nose

鼻青脸肿.en: a bloody nose and a swollen face, badly battered

齁.en: to snore, thirsty from excessively salty or sweet food, (dialect) very, extremely

齐.en: (name of states and dynasties at several different periods), surname Qi
neat, even, level with, identical, simultaneous, all together, to even sth out

齐国.en: Qi state of Western Zhou and the Warring states (1122-265 BC), centered in Shandong

齐心协力.en: to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts, to pull together, to work as one

齐聚一堂.en: to get together all at once

龄.en: age, length of experience, membership etc

龊.en: dirty, filthy, base, mean, narrow-minded, petty

龌龊.en: dirty, filthy, vile, despicable, narrow-minded, petty

龙人.en: Dragon Man, the nickname of the individual whose fossilized cranium was discovered in Heilongjiang in 1933, thought to be a Denisovan 丹尼索瓦人[Dan1 ni2 suo3 wa3 ren2] or a new species of extinct human, Homo longi

龙崎.en: Lungchi township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan

龙舌兰.en: agave (genus of plants), Agave americana, tequila

龙门.en: Longmen county in Huizhou 惠州[Hui4 zhou1], Guangdong, mythical Dragon gate where a carp can transform into a dragon

龙头.en: faucet, water tap, bicycle handle bar, chief (esp. of gang), boss, decision maker, (market) leader (of companies), front end of mud-flow, figurehead on prow of dragon boat 龍船|龙船

龙凤.en: Longfeng district of Daqing city 大慶|大庆[Da4 qing4], Heilongjiang

庞德.en: Pang De (-219), general of Cao Wei at the start of the Three Kingdoms period, victor over Guan Yu 關羽|关羽, Pound (name), Ezra Pound (1885-1972), American poet and translator

庞贝.en: Pompeii, ancient Roman town near Naples, Italy

龟头.en: head of a turtle, glans penis
